predictions.name: Bitcoin

methodology: Predictions based on multi-timeframe momentum analysis, pattern recognition, and risk scoring. Confidence levels: HIGH (>75 score), MEDIUM (60-75 score), LOW (<60 score). All predictions time-boxed for verification.
disclaimer: These are algorithmic predictions for testing purposes only. Not financial advice. Meme coins are extremely volatile and can lose 50%+ in hours.
